#include <iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
    int a,b;
    cin>>a>>b;
    int f=b%4;
    if((f==0)&&(pow(a,4)>9))
    {int h=pow(a,4);
    h=h%10;
        cout<<h<<"\n";
    
    }
    else if ((f==0)&&(pow(a,4)<=9))
     cout<<pow(a,4)<<"\n";
else{
    f=pow(a,f);
     if(f<=9)
    cout<<f<<"\n";
    else
    cout<<f%10<<"\n";
}
    
    
}
	
	
	
return 0;
}
